name: .FUR
summary: Learn about .FUR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open a FUR file with tildearrow Furnace. To do so, select file → open... from Furnace's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your FUR file. After you do, the song your FUR file contains will appear in Furnace.
You can use tildearrow Furnace to convert the song a FUR file contains to the following formats:
To do so, select file → export... and then choose the format from the "Export" window.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .fur file in Furnace
images.caption: FUR file open in Furnace
